channel.title: Lightening Rune for Glowing Gloo / Power Flowers / Power Packs
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Lightening Rune for Glowing Gloo / Power Flowers / Power Packs" - I have A lightening rune up for trade...

item.title: Re: Lightening Rune for Glowing Gloo / Power Flowers / Power Packs
item.content:encoded: Thanks for all the offers, this trade is now complete :)

item.title: Re: Lightening Rune for Glowing Gloo / Power Flowers / Power Packs
item.content:encoded:
I'm currently trying to pull off a deal, but it loks like it might fall through.

50 of each sounds great, rotating time spheres are good too.

If this deal doesnt go through by the end of tonight, Tuesday, I'll take you up on thatâ€¦.

PM, 'APB' on BvS to let me know.

If your quick I'll break this current deal sooner, beacuse I've already waited 24hrs and I want a sale! So I want to see the goods not the promis of them, no matter how many.
(mmm, I should have accepted on of those monster drops, from people it know. this is taking far to long to get the Goo. At this rate I wil have made it all myself before this gets completed!!)

item.title: Re: Lightening Rune for Glowing Gloo / Power Flowers / Power Packs

KazeNR has 6 Glowing Goos. Is that good enough?
Damn, why are these flowers so rare.

item.title: Re: Lightening Rune for Glowing Gloo / Power Flowers / Power Packs
item.content:encoded: How many Goos are you looking for?

item.title: Lightening Rune for Glowing Gloo / Power Flowers / Power Packs
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I'm looking for lots of Glowing Gloo / Power Flowers / Power Packs. I have already turned down 2 offeres of monster drops for this as ny village really needs these mixing items.

Make me an offer!
